alert.note: Alert for Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 04 at 2:45PM CDT until November 05 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Louisiana and southeast Texas. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 8 AM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel may be difficult due to low visibility. There may also be sudden changes in visibilty. The low visibility will limit your reation time.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange
